name: Style Guide Starter For Webflow Projects
description:
Style Guide Starter For Webflow projects â€“ Designed With Accessibility In Mind.


Elements are named as per the classes used in Webflow. Sizes and spaces are considered in rem, assuming 1rem=16px. The style guide will be continuously updated.


The project contains the following elements that you may customise to your own style:

  • Headings
  • Text elements
  • Buttons & links in different states
  • Icons
  • Contact form
  • Spacers
  • Sections
